title: The Mystic Nine
resume: The drama is a prequel to The Lost Tomb in which the story focuses  on the exploits of the nine grave robbing families in the 1940s. With  the help of his friends Fortune Teller Qi Tie Zue and Opera Singer Er  Yue Hong, General Zhang Qi Shan entered into a strange mine to discover a  mysterious ancient tomb. After many untold dangers, he uncovered a  Japanese plot to kill the residents of Changsha city. The men banded  together to stop the Japanese's plot, thereby saving their city.
